articles.contents:
Introduction
I am a data analyst and a clinical programmer. I have been directly involved in multiple data analytics projects including clinical trials analysis that requires good SAS, Python and R programming skills. I also have experience in clinical programming (with SDTM and ADaM datasets) and was offered training by Nimble Clinical Research LLC based in the US.
What is the website about?
Here, you can find more about me and various articles related to data science.
